q: Tony Dungy Expects Michael Vick , Eagles To Reach Deal Courier Post- Tony Dungy , who has served as a mentor to Michael Vick , believes the quarterback will come to terms with the Eagles on a long-term contract. He is very grateful to Jeffrey Lurie and Andy Reid for believing in him and giving him an opportunity, Tony Dungy told the Courier Post.`` He loves working with Marty Mornhinweg , he loves the young receivers and all the offensive firepower they have here. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. href="http://topnews360.tmcnet.com/news/2011/01/20/5256141.htm" title="Legal-

Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. " Turns out the ceremony was the brainchild of Mayor Tom Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway , a rebel key distributor.
